p: The methanolic extract of T. polium showed varied antifungal activity ( Table 3). Our results indicate that the extract exhibited a moderate inhibitory effect against unicellular yeast ( C. albicans, ATCC 10231, C. vaginalis, and C. neoformans ATCC 14116) and low activity against filamentous fungi ( A. fumigatus ATCC 204305 and A. niger). By comparing the results obtained in the presence of Amphotericin B, we observe that only for C. vaginalis (clinical strain, 136) the diameter of inhibition zone is higher that the used control. Based on the minimum fungicidal concentration (MFC)/MIC ratio, antifungal compounds present in our extract acts as fungicidal agents against the tested fungi.
